item.title: Staging to live with Ansible
item.description: 08/24/22 Here are the steps for Taking a WordPress website live using Ansible. This process should be used when needing to move a WordPress website from Staging to Production. In the DigitalOcean interface create ‘pre-migration’ snapshots of both the current ‘live’ server (soon to become the deprecated server) and the staging server Make updates to the staging server to replace the live server Edit the Apache virtual host file (should be: /etc/apache2/sites-available/wordpress.
